title.rendered: Find Rooms For Rent in Boerum Hill

content.rendered:
Boerum Hill is a unique neighborhood in Brooklyn. Here you’ll find an eclectic mix of lifestyles living side by side. And there are great restaurants in Boerum Hill! A major feature that differentiates this neighborhood from the rest is it still maintains its historic character amidst its modern-day surroundings. For those who are looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill, you will find homes here for every taste and budget. In the neighborhood, you’ll discover multiple apartments, townhouses, and even single-family dwellings! This Boerum Hill guide will help to get to know more about the area.

Where is Boerum Hill?

Located between the neighborhoods of Fort Greene and Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill is a neighborhood in Brooklyn, New York. As one of Brooklyn’s most diverse neighborhoods, Boerum Hill offers something for everyone, including shopping. Continue reading this guide to Boerum Hill to know more about the life in the neighborhood and its average rent.

Related: Find Rooms For Rent In Binghamton, NY

Find Rooms For Rent in Boerum Hill?

Find A Room For Rent In Boerum Hill, Brooklyn

Boerum Hill is a small neighborhood known for its diverse population and historic architecture. The flavorful restaurants in Boerum Hill are also an important part of the neighborhood. The tree-lined streets and small community feel create a warm atmosphere that makes the neighborhood a place you’ll want to call home!

Average Rent in Boerum Hill

If you are looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill, then you will be happy to know that the neighborhood is renter-friendly with 76% of its households renter-occupied. The average rent in Boerum Hill is a little expensive compared to the other neighborhoods in Brooklyn. But, don’t worry! With some research and help you’ll always find the best rooms for rent in Boerum Hill.

Is Boerum Hill safe?

Boerum Hill is a safe and cozy neighborhood. The crime rates of the neighborhood are below the national average. However, here are some apps and numbers you should be aware of while looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill.

  • AreaVibes: AreaVibes is an app that allows you to quickly assess the livability of any given zip code. The service provides information about nearby amenities and their quality; crime statistics; housing costs; schools and education ratings; employment data; transportation options and weather.
  • AroundMe: The AroundMe app was developed to allow consumers to easily find locations of nearby banks, hotels, restaurants, and gas stations. By simply typing in your current location or selecting one on the map found within the app’s interface, users are given a list of nearby businesses sorted according to category and distance from their current location.
  • NeighborhoodScout: If you’re wondering “where is Boerum Hill and is it safe,” then you can use NeighborhoodScout. It is an app that allows you to search for any address in your area and find out how safe it is. It then gives you the necessary details about the neighborhood. Make sure you use this tool before looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill.
  • Hotline Numbers: 911 and 311 are the important ones to dial in times of emergencies. You can contact 911 for serious emergencies like a fire, crime in progress, life-threatening situations, etc. For non-emergencies like reporting graffiti or road damage, or simply making an inquiry about a service, contact 311.

Public Transit in Boerum Hill

Walkability

If you are looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill, then you would be happy to know that the neighborhood is a walker’s paradise with a score of 98 out of 100. Boerum Hill is the 23rd most walkable neighborhood in New York.

Roads & Traffic

Brooklyn is one of the most crowded places in New York City. As traffic is an issue for most New Yorkers, residents of Boerum Hill report similar issues with traffic for a fair share of their day.

Nearby Train Stations

It is important to check the nearby train stations before looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill. The nearest train station to Boerum Hill is Atlantic Avenue – Barclays Center Station. Other stations near the region are LIRR Atlantic Terminal, MTA – Hoyt-Schermerhorn Station, and MTA – Fulton Street Station.

Nearby Bus Stops

Commuters can take the B37, B38, B65, B67, and B103 New York City bus routes, which serve through Boerum Hill. You can catch these buses at CityMD Boerum Hill.

Restaurants in Boerum Hill

The next time you are wondering where to grab brunch in New York City, head to the restaurants in Boerum Hill. This trendy area is packed with restaurants, bars, and cafes that offer everything from Mexican fare to Italian cuisine. It’s a vibrant neighborhood full of unique charm.

Rucola

Rucola is a small restaurant in Boerum Hill, on a quiet block. It has exposed brick and worn wood interior. This place oozes Italian charm and luxury. The seafood and drinks here are a must-try!

Visit Website

The HiHi Room

The HiHi Room is one of the restaurants in Boerum Hill that has been serving brunch to the residents of Brooklyn for a long time. They specialize in delicious, healthy breakfast food that will keep you fueled all morning long (and also tastes great with coffee). You should definitely give their brunch a try when you’re out looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill.

Visit Website

Grand Army

Grand Army is a restaurant in Boerum Hill, Brooklyn. They offer a unique dining experience that blends farm-to-table cuisine with a rustic industrial aesthetic. They serve commendable cocktails which are worth going back for!

Visit Website

Parks in Boerum Hill

  • Boerum Park: This is a small park which is named after a farmer from 18th century Simon Boerum. The park has a small playground and a water sprinkler.
  • Cobble Hill Park: On a brisk fall evening in Brooklyn, you can hear the crunch of leaves in Cobble Hill Park. The park has benches, a garden, and a play area for kids under the broad trees.
  • Nicholas Naquan Heyward Jr. Park: Those looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill and love playing basketball will fawn over this park’s basketball court. Also, this park features a playground, garden, and water sprinklers.

Related: Best Value Neighborhood Review: Bedford-Stuyvesant

Museums near Boerum Hill

Brooklyn Museum

The Brooklyn Museum is home to some of New York City’s most important pieces of art history. Highlights include ancient Egyptian artifacts and African art from every corner of the continent. If you are out looking for rooms for rent in Boerum Hill, then visit the museum for a great time!

Color Factory

If you’re even remotely interested in art, you need to visit the Color Factory in NYC. Color Factory showcases over 50 featured artists from around the world who serve as inspirations for the space’s whimsical décor. There are various themed rooms with vibrant artwork from visual artists.

Whitney Museum of American Art

The Whitney Museum of American Art is one of the premier art museums in New York City. With an impressive collection ranging from 19th-century American paintings to contemporary art, the museum hosts a variety of exhibits each year with a focus on modern and contemporary art.

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find rooms for rent in Boerum Hill? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
